snippet.title: Farscape The Game Character Models Trailer (2000-2001)
snippet.description:
Old game trailer rescued from deceased FTP site backup, from around 2000-2001. Farscape: The Game is an action game based upon the Sci-Fi TV show. You can direct a team of three characters from the show, relying on their specific abilities to accomplish missions. 

This is old findings from the original FTP archive of our old games site. This was available for download back then in the FTP in 2001.
Check also:
https://www.youtube.com/user/wwweDomenet
Please subscribe:
https://www.youtube.com/user/jukkaokauppinen?sub_confirmation=1 

Published by
Simon & Schuster Interactive
Developed by
Jim Henson Interactive, Red Lemon Studios
Released
Aug 08, 2002
Platform
Windows

The player directly controls only one character, while others help the protagonist in combat. The game requires that all of the characters survive, otherwise the game is over. It also requires that you work with the characters, which may have slightly different agendas. The game is set on planets that require exploration, ships, and various outworldly places.
